name: Scratch Invaders
description:
Remember Scratch? Here's a game to relive the days when coding was fun and easy! Play as Scratchy the cat, and let the right code blocks go through while eliminating bugs with Scratchy's laser eyes :) No segfaults here, or are there?

Controls and game objective:

  1. A/D keys for left/right movement
  2. Spacebar to shoot lasers
  3. Let the code block that is displayed on the top-left corner through to score points!
  4. Make sure to destroy all other code blocks or you'll get a bug :( if you get 5 bugs it's game over!

Credit:

  • Music: Kevin Payne
  • Programmers: Daniel, William, Mann
  • Art: AJ
